nodes.text: Coachelle Automata was the manufacturer of the LEP servant droid.

Coachelle Automata was created by Jason Fry for the Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Visual Guide Ultimate Battles. The Coachelle system is home to the Lepi species, which resemble rabbits. The rabbit-like ears on the LEP servant droid further reinforce the connection between the company and the Lepi species.
